overview: Matt has over 20 years of management, business development and consulting experience, specializing in the commercialization of technology. Matt’s experience ranges from large corporations to founding a web services start-up, most recently serving as the EVP of Business Development and Corporate Strategy for NextAction Corporation, where he was responsible for all of the firm’s new revenue and operating plans. Prior to joining NextAction, Matt had extensive general management experience at Level 3 Communications, Inc. and AOL LLC, where he developed and executed strategic plans to improve profitability, increase revenues and grow market share. Earlier in his career, Matt held several consulting positions, including roles at Booz Allen Hamilton, PricewaterhouseCoopers and Accenture. Matt holds a BS in finance and management information systems from Boston College and an MBA from the Colgate Darden Graduate School of Business Administration at the University of Virginia.

degrees.subject: General Management
degrees.institution: The Darden School, University of Virginia
